title: v1.6.3.4-v10 8 Critical Fixes
details:
v1.6.3.4-v10 fixes 8 critical Quick Tab issues:
1. QuickTabWindow.restore() - Only updates state, no DOM manipulation
2. VisibilityHandler - Generation counter pattern for debounce timers
3. UICoordinator - Look-ahead pattern determines final state before Map modifications
4. MinimizedManager - Atomic snapshot clearing with local variables
5. UpdateHandler - 64-bit hash using djb2+sdbm returning {lo, hi}
6. DestroyHandler - _batchOperationIds Set replaces _batchMode boolean
7. storage-utils - queueStorageWrite resets queue on failure
8. All files - Comprehensive logging at decision branches
